TASK: Craft an item of type: light_blue_banner
inventory=[{"type": "light_blue_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 14}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 31}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 19, "index": 34}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 5, "index": 35}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "lime_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 30, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft a light_blue_banner, I need to place 6 light_blue_wool in the crafting table. I will start by moving the first light_blue_wool from slot 14 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1
